plot: It's the stuff of legends: The Muppets tell the magical story of the chorus pig who rises from barnyard obscurity to super stardom and finds the short, green and handsome frog of her dreams, with both original production and material from the best of the Muppet Show series. Now Kermit and Miss Piggy, with mamusical and dramatic support from Cheryl Ladd, Tony Randall, Loretta Swit and Raquel Welch, give fans an inside look at a true Hollywood romance -- Muppet Style!   Written by  James Davis
title: Muppet Video: The Kermit and Piggy Story
